com.joliciel.talismane.utils

Class CSVFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.joliciel.talismane.utils.CSVFormatter

  • public class CSVFormatter
extends java.lang.Object
    Various utilities for formatting text to CSV and reading out of a CSV file.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli

        public int getColumnIndex(java.lang.String label)
        Get the zero-based column index corresponding to a particular label, e.g. BB=(26*2)+2-1=54-1=53.
